name: Monster Rancher 2 DX
description: Welcome to the magical world of Monster Rancher! The beloved series makes its triumphant return with Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX, bringing together the wildly popular simulation games – Monster Rancher and Monster Rancher 2 – all in one amazing collection. Raise your own monsters and train them to compete against other eccentric creatures in combat and tournaments. With hundreds of different monster types, each with their own skills and abilities, every Rancher will be able to raise and train a monster that's a perfect fit for their personality and play style. Returning fans and newcomers alike can enjoy the timeless monster training and battling experience in Monster Rancher 1 & 2 DX!

Created in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 35 game jam with the theme "Shapeshift"

Control a micro drone that is capable of hacking AI systems. Infiltrate a facility and destroy the brain core which controls the enemy drones. (Unfortunately, I need to rush the ending)

The game is short as I have removed some planned features and levels because of the time constraint Still, I hope you guys will enjoy playing it. :)

name: Alette If
description:
In Alette If, player controls Penny, a Metal Knight pilot who travels to a mysterious archaeological site to find her partner.

Submitted in this 2019's #GMTKJam. The theme of the jam was "Only One", so the game features: one action button, one character, one place, one enemy, one NPC and one battle. In Alette If, player controls Penny a pilot who set off on a journey to find Des her partner in the archaeological site El Zotz.

description: The Fallen is a shooter game set in the foggy ruins of an obliterated airport in Ukraine's disputed Eastern regions. Steal the souls of all those who stand in your way to bargain with the Soothsayer for a tale of the dungeon’s horrors. But remember the one truth of the Dungeon: there is no way out.

name: Helena's Flowers
description:
After her elopement with the neighboring Wilusan princess, Achaea declares war on Wilusa resulting in a years-long bloody conflict. As the war is drawing to a close, Helena is escorted back to her rightful place in Achaea. However, something goes wrong and their ship crash lands on a desolate tiny planet, killing everyone on board except for Helena and a single soldier.

Now stranded in the vastness of space with only a strange soldier for company, Helena finds herself thinking about what sort of fate awaits her. And more importantly, does she even have a place to return to?

The retro-style 3D graphics imagine a history of queer punk games in the late 1990s, connecting those politics of resistance to today.

name: Before They Leave
description:
A short story of depression, friends, and crushes.
Samantha Fiddler has been depressed for the better part of the last two years of highschool. She's barely scraping by, and nothing makes sense. She wants to go home and sleep. She feels guilty about everything... but for the time being she just needs to hold it together while hanging outside with her best friends.

This game was made as a submission for Yuri Game Jam 2017.

description: Guide a fallen star dragon back to it's place among the stars.

name: Academy Romance 7
description: 9 out of 10 bachelors recommend it.

description: A game made about conflict, racism, violence with mechanics mixing AI, agency and emergent behaviours.

name: A Tale about Tail

name: CircL
description: What would you do ? What would you say? Just to survive.

name: Inner Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Wanderer
description: An episodic 2D adventure game blending cinematic platformer and RPG into a beautiful lo-fi sci-fi universe.

name: Doki Doki Chefs
description: Can you make enough soup before time runs out?! A Gameboy-style demake of Overcooked for Demake JAM!

name: Hibernia
description: Make your kingom the most famous in ancient Ireland.

name: Liberation Circuit
description: Rogue A.I. Simulator

name: Helios
description: City builder meets card game.

name: Shell Kingdom
description: Command a group of turtles

name: Bickadoodle
description: Hand-drawn fairy-tale adventure.

name: Bermudes
description: Horror and suspense game, where you are trapped on a weird island.

name: Gnome Gname
description: Create a mess for a family of trolls as you go about a regular day in a gnome's life.

name: Another Mythical Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Walk in the Rain
description: Simple, relaxing walking simulation

name: Approaches
description: Ambient horror game about repairing a radio tower and birdwatching.

name: Albert
description: Venture through a new land with Albert as he is looking for a new beginning, and an escape from his past.

name: 2 Foxes and the Puzzling Forest
description: Play as 2 foxes as they navigate through dozens of puzzles in hopes to play and find shelter!

name: Skate Samurai
description: A fight game about an Archer and a Samurai

name: Scatterhoard
description: A Sokoban-style, totally accurate huge acorn hoarding simulator

name: Draw-A-Mountain
description: Draw a mountain and watch it come to life

name: Eva
description: Um Plataforma 2D SinglePlayer controlando uma Feiticeira

name: Sai
description: Stop the machines. Save the forest.

name: The Forest Cries
description: A child wanders around through a cursed forest in search of their beloved grandmother. Can you guide her safely?

name: It's a Giant!
description: Have fun being big!

name: Lost Player
description: You are a lost player looking for true world.

name: Sweet Fruits from the Magical Tree
description: Sin descripción

name: Rescue Mael!
description: An interactive short-movie about teens friendship, monsters and space

name: Crowd King
description: Are you the next Crowd King?

name: RetroScape
description: In RetroScape you're a lonesome astronaut in space. Your space station is hit by an asteroid and your goal is to make it to your escape pod and head back to Earth.

name: Moon Slasher
description: Slash the enemies, jump up to 'The MOON' and meet 'The MOON' at the top.

name: Stagnatum
description: A forest guardian stuck in a forest loop.

name: Mono Grav
description: You have one button to control your gravity and avoid aliens in this abandoned space station.

name: Quick Scrap
description: Sin descripción

name: Gas vs. Dwarves
description: Eat to grow more! Help Gas protect his home!

name: Aevenn
description: A relaxing, atmospheric walking simulator with no goals or game mechanics

name: Furries & Scalies & Bears Oh My!: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arnaud Thion's Dragons
description: Destroy the land as a dragon!

name: Roomba May Cry
description: Be the roomba responsible for the dirty job

name: Ocda
description: Jump, dash, find hidden goodies, play as a potato.

name: Mr. Fishbones
description: ​Jump from Ice to Ice in this short 3D Platformer.​

name: Flip of Light
description: A precision platformer where you can instantaneously flip from ceiling to floor. Run, jump, and flip your way through difficult and vibrant stages, each themed around a pair of complementary colors. Master a constant barrage of new level mechanics, each designed around your flip ability.

name: Obsidienne
description: A speedrunn oriented game in which you'll have to slice obstacles to beat the levels.

name: Platformer of Death
description: A 2D platformer

name: The Blue Katana
description: Fast-paced and challenging action game. Master the art of The Blue Katana and exterminate all life in each level.

name: Death Again
description: Jump off of your corpse to... win! :D

name: Lemonhunter
description: Go on a byte-sized adventure to find the golden lemon inside the procedurally generated caves of Lemonhunter.

name: Deep Sleep
description: Traverse through challenging levels with the help of your Dream Pillow

name: Maze of the Mini-taur
description: Make your way through the labyrinth while you move and manipulate its very rooms. Can you escape?

name: Pipe Skull
description: lead the skull through the pipelines!

name: Hacker Ball
description: Mahnut Tucner hayranı ana karakterimizin oyunu başarıyla geçememesinin hikayesi.

name: Anise Flowers
description: A small and cute visual novel about a farmer and a fallen angel

name: Slice 'Em Up!
description: Slice cells and stop their growth!

name: Rubber Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Times Turn
description: Push and swing time itself through different landscapes in this speedy 2D physics platformer!

name: Speedrun Squid
description: Grapple your way through the sea and catch the fish!

name: It Knows You're Here
description: Small horror game with an adaptive AI Director!

name: Calm Forest
description:
Calm Forest is a short horror story about looking for the way home.

Will you find it?

name: Star Guard
description: Star Guard is a 2D platformer brought back to the basic elements of the genre: jumping and shooting, with a distinct retro look. Enemies are red, allies are green and the levels consist of yellow lines against a black background. The player controls a spaceman on a mission to defeat an evil wizard, armed only with a single gun that fires in the direction the character is facing.

name: Kardiossomatic
description: Follow your heart's signs and survive dangerous illusions and a strange reality.

name: Village Tanuki
description:
Village Tanuki is a narrative based, maze chase game.

You are playing as Jun, one of many tanukis (Japanese raccoon dog) that works in a certain tanuki group in a forest. The group is infamous for their excellent job at foraging and distributing berries throughout other tanukis in the forest. Your job is to collect berries from human villages to please your boss. Can you do it?

name: Living Labyrinth
description: An explorer has found themselves trapped in a shifting labyrinth.

name: Nabokos
description: A Sokoban Reversed puzzle game.

name: Terrapins
description: Classic 80s arcade action for the ZX Spectrum

name: HackLab
description: If you want to live, you have to cheat!

name: Lotan
description: Chaoskampf on the Stormy Seas

name: Monster Club
description: Welcome to The Monster Club. A family that’s truly stranger than fiction.

name: Castle Rush
description: Pick up fast your brick's !

name: Fency Krabby
description: Gentlekrabs, ready to battle! Don't let anyone take you the title of Crab King!

name: Overcrowded
description: Will you hide and disturb the festival or are you a guard who seeks for order? Find out in this multiplayer party game.

name: Bizzarioware
description: Bizzarioware is an ongoing collection of psychedelic, strange and surreal microgames played for 15 seconds or less.

name: Kangarumble
description: The one and only walloping wallaby split-second-stomp party!

name: Driver's Work Trip
description: Online open world racing, driving game

name: Terminull
description: Terminull is a game in which you play as a 1990's hacker that's planting viruses into government servers.

name: Gartic on Stream
description: GOS is a streaming game where your audience guesses drawings made in real time.

name: Reikon Dungeon
description: Fantasy 3D Roguelike demo!

name: Handdogg
description: Hand + Dog = A grapple hook platformer!

name: Mage March
description: A rhythm game for an unusual audience.

name: Bobls
description: Tiny platformer with a bouncy mechanic

name: The Hungry Witch and the Gourmet Dish
description: To find some sweets she made a wish.

name: The Last Quest
description: Another game where you complete tasks and kill a lot of people.

name: Freegglers
description: Freegglers is an action-platformer with unique, funny and chaotic, flexible, physics-base movement of the main character. Train, jump, fight and find the escape hole inside the maze of traps, rescue your fellow Freegglers who suffer under the tyranny of Evil Freaks.

name: Casadastra
description: Tread with see-through plan into the ocean of the night.

name: Escape from the Squirrel Park
description: Sin descripción

name: Quynh
description: Stories revolving around the guests of a mysterious tea shop and its owner.

name: Dies Mortis
description: Dies Mortis is a bittersweet story that presents a metaphorical view of death.

name: Bagman Comes Back
description: The return of the convict

name: Lady Pac
description:
Lady Pac is a homage to Ms. Pac-Man, an arcade game published by Midway in 1982.

Main differences from the original version:
- Randomly generated mazes
- Bonus rounds

name: Forest
description: A Game Boy game made with GBstudio. Entry for "a game by its cover" jam.

name: The Prince's Heart
description: A yaoi visual novel that will have you begging for more!

name: Fluffhood's Adventure
description: A Togainu No Chi fan game, Little Red Riding Hood style

name: Pink Rose
description: A bittersweet story about first love.

name: Polka Dot Pirate
description:
Pick up rare, mysterious treasures and give them to your pirate friends.

A game by Daniel Linssen, with music by Jared Hahn.

Made for GGJ 2017.

name: Pullto
description: Challenging mouse maze and puzzle hybrid

name: Very Scary Eatery
description: A VERY short and VERY scary horror game made for the two minute horror game-jam. Hope you enjoy it.)

name: Flowers for You
description: Give flowers to your crush on Flower Day! Or...not?

name: Vampliar
description: A boys' love kinetic novel about a human who meets a vampire.

name: My Best Friend's Birthday
description: Give something nice for your friend's special day!

name: Undeniable Feelings
description: A short bl story

name: Fox in the Hollyhocks
description: Young love blooms in Altea Rosata

name: Brownies and Brimstone
description: Super gay visual novel about hot demons, baked goods, and liberation

name: MonsterMatch!
description: Date some strange but lovable monsters!

name: Agarta
description: Agarta is an interactive live-action game (FMV), it follows the story of a serial killer nicknamed the Surgeon. You will observe his plans as he questions the themes of justice and law on earth. You have to choose wisely because any decisions you make will lead you to one of the 19 finals.

name: A Chase in Rainsville
description: Your cooking pot has suddenly grown legs and ran away! It's up to you to catch it!

name: The Elephant in Her Room
description:
Sometimes a single-minded love can be too heavy. It's like an elephant. Go through her prejudiced gaze and tell her how attractive you really are.

Sokoban with some twists and romance.

name: Botany?
description: Use magic to grow a plant!

name: The Beast Named Eliza
description: Eliza needs to find out what happened to her and why people are acting strange. Help her find the answer!

name: Your World, 50 Years From Now
description: A short story of resistance set in a near, dystopian future.

name: Inevitable
description: July 2018 - Game Jam

name: Cloud Mage
description: You're a cloud mage doing weather spells for clients. Choose the right ingredients to make the right spells!

name: My Special Little Flower
description: minimal 2d adventure about gay plants.

name: Echo
description: "ECHO" - Is a first person PT styled game developed in 10 days for the "Scream Machine" Jam

name: Left Among Dead in Space
description: Submission to NOKIA 3310 JAM 3, my first game jam.

name: Heart Agency
description: Adrian Heart is a reclusive composer dragged into the world of the entertainment industry by his famous sister to become the new personal assistant to one of the elite talents who calls the agency home. He is none to happy about it.

name: Timeless hero
description: Fight through the pure random maze and remove the curse from all creatures.

name: Halt the Heist!
description: An online party game

name: Marble Run
description: Videowall game with alternative controller

name: Last Man Kicking
description: a bunch of dude play soccer in a swivel chair... any more questions?

name: Pool Party
description:
Grab some phones or tablets and join the Pool Party! Social distancing in effect - you can stream the game through any app that lets you share your screen to play with your friends across the world.

Sink all your balls and you win! It's that easy!

name: Take your time Race Game
description: Enjoy your night ride..

name: Infamous Duck Ball
description: boat, duck, and balloonfish

name: Deep Relics
description: Deep underwater you drive a submarine to find relics.

name: Arid Puzzle
description: Sin descripción

name: Elephants Remember
description: An interactive music track

name: Sargasso
description: A girl and a large man are forgotten and left in the Super Sargasso Sea and must learn the strange world together.

name: Thug Racer!
description: Outrun the need for speed...

name: Handoru Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Shut Up and Drive
description: Get your adrenaline up & finish 10 Tracks before your rivals.

name: Rad Road Rally
description: X-Treme Top-down Racing Revival

name: Friender Bender
description: A party sabotage driving game for up to 4 players!

name: Stereo Driver
description: An interactive audio visual driving experience.

name: I am dead where are my keys
description: a halloween space adventure

name: Chimney Prowler
description: Christmas horror with a twist

name: Grimcurse
description: Venture down into a gallery-shooter top-down RPG hybrid. Manage your resources while you wander around the cryptic jungle with questions no one wants to know the answers to.

name: Flatwoods
description: You are Lemon, a small child that feels a great need to uncover the mystery of the "shooting star" that has just flown over your home and landed somewhere in the woods nearby. Loosely based on the story of the Flatwoods Monster.

name: Pentabrawl
description: Party Combat Game for up to 4 Players!

name: Kiteboarding Pro
description: Race against the clock in time trials, beat that ultimate high score in freestyle or go BIG with massive jumps in freeride mode. From wakestyle to oldschool to kiteloops to wave riding - in Kiteboarding Pro the sky isn't the limit.

name: Deluded
description: Deluded is the latest live action crime thriller game by New IDEA Games, it's an experimental fusion of narrative FMV (Full Motion Video), point and click investigation and quick time event (QTE) based interactive games. You play as a detective and try to solve a case with your the assistance of Susan.

name: Rise Up!
description: Rise Up!, a space adventure and survival game with hints of 4x that tests your strategic abilities and challenges your entrepreneurial skills. Scavenge for supplies. Recover and repurpose the mangled bits of robots and equipment. Repair and fly your drone before mining asteroids. Build your empire. Collect achievement badges as you progress. Rise Up! contains stunning visuals and an original soundtrack. The game also includes free updates and players will have the opportunity to make decisions on future updates.

name: Ultimate Super Powers Old Maid: 3Days
description:
Produced in 3 days!
The Ultimate Combination of Old maid and Mahjong!

"Ultimate Super Powers Old Maid: 3Days" is a game based on the card game Babanuki. It is an irregular Old Maid where the player's actions are determined by the ability tiles that are replenished each turn, apart from the cards such as Numbers and Jokers.

name: Ruins
description:
Ruins is hybrid roguelike/TTRPG dungeon crawling adventure game for one player and friends. It is inspired by old school dungeons and dragons, parser based adventure games, traditional roguelikes, and post-forge tabletop roleplaying games.

Roll your own dice and keep your own notes as you explore infinite procedurally generated dungeons.

Continue playing outside the game application, meeting with other delvers and roleplaying your communions, trades, and conversations huddled around the campfire.

Delve deep into layers of complex history and right long forgotten wrongs, piecing together the ancient lore of the ruins.

name: Stick Match
description: A silly game for two players.

name: Egg King
description: Egg King is a platformer game with a twist, you're going to go down by jumping and rolling. Go on a journey across the land and reach the lost crown of the king. Visit different landscapes and raise your ability. Become the new king and make the rich!

name: ZigZag
description: ZIGZAG is a little arcade game.

name: Autoconfim
description: A little precision platformer where you have to be constant.

name: Dream Dye
description:
A 2D puzzle platformer in which you delve into dreams and mix colours to dye objects, in a world where colours are a pigment of the imagination.

Dream Dye takes place in a doctor's office in the fictional village of Renkaya, a relatively normal village with just one strange difference—the only way to “make” colour is to dream about it.

name: Postbird in Provence
description: Hop on your bike and become Marcel, the new postbird in town! Meet the lovely and quirky people of Montélimace and bring this charming village back to life. Set amongst the lavender fields and fanned by the sea breeze, take a real breath of provençal air.

name: Your Gay Monster Family
description: Only one ending. Don't worry about it.

name: Mixed Feelings
description: You find yourself whisked away into a beautiful place that's strangely familiar. Join Peri, Silas, and Kahira as they take you through Asphodel Meadows, and fall deeper and deeper down the rabbit hole as you learn more about their lives, the world around you, and possibly... yourself.

name: Angry Birds Journey
description: Angry Birds Journey is a new installment of one of the most popular skill games in the Android universe. The birds are back and this time we will have to solve a multitude of levels in order to recover the magic eggs that are lost.

name: Virtual Beggar
description: A clicker game where every screen tap gives money to a beggar.

name: Time to Morp
description: Time to Morp is a colony sim game in which you take care of playful creatures - Morps. Use their skills to gather resources, build pipe networks, automate everything and explore the world to find new species and rare materials.

name: One-Eyed Ripper
description:
The protagonist, Mebuki Meme, had a peaceful everyday life.
A dear friend, and a dear brother, she held them closely.

However, that mundane peacefulness came to an abrupt end.
Because of the “murder case” which revolving around her.

“The One Eyed Ripper.”
Remembering that name,
Rumors created by someone had created a murderer.
Those peaceful everyday’s have ended.
Now begins the story of a person killing another.

For love, for desire, for the sake of finding the right answer.
Well then, who’s the culprit?

name: Bad Gobelet
description:
There is a dark tower with a deep basement that holds the BAD GOBLET, an evil artifact that many have attempted to retrieve for research... or to make use of its strange powers...

You're desperate enough to try and find it. You will face evil monsters and the limits of your own strength and wit. Also the tower is really really scary.

name: MawaruWorld
description: You move the world! Protect your trees and watch out for thunder storms and asteroids

name: A Garden on the Sea
description: A Garden on the Sea, an indie adventure game, tells the journey of Elliot and Lori to find a new home. Dive, explore and tend to your garden to uncover a story of fear, of growing up and being in the middle of the ocean.

name: No More Papers Please
description: No more papers please is a physics-based game about working over-time in a stressful job. Use the tools in your office to fill out the papers and put them in your scanner. Make sure you get the work done as soon as possible so you can go home to your family!

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
description: Take on the role of one of the notorious Slaughter family, or their victims, in The Texas Chain Saw Massacre, a third-person asymmetrical horror experience based on the groundbreaking and iconic 1974 horror film.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series
description: In the near future on the outskirts of the asteroid belt, a bloody mutiny breaks loose on the Artemis. You take the role of XO Camina Drummer, where your choices determine the fate of the ship. What will you do with the truth, Bosmang?

name: Thirsty Suitors
description: Can Jala learn to love herself and heal the wounds of her past? Thirsty Suitors is a stylish, story-driven adventure that unfolds through turn-based battles, skateboarding, and cooking.

name: Have a Nice Death
description: Have a Nice Death is a 2D action roguelite where you play as an overworked Death, whose employees have run rampant, completely throwing off the balance of souls - and his vacation plans. In order to restore order, you'll have to grab your trusty scythe and show your employees who's boss.

name: Summer Gems
description:
Summer.

A special time when anything can happen.

The possibilities are infinite: even a shard of glass worn by the sea

can become the most precious treasure.

Friendships are like that.

In a seaside summer, friendships can last no longer

than a splashing wave.

But like those pieces of glass,

they're turned into treasures by the sea.

That is what happens to Leo and Mara.

Join them in this little summer break through the salty breeze

of the Mediterranean Sea.

Explore. Live. Love.

name: MiniNatura
description:
Ever wondered what it'd be like to view nature from a completely different perspective? In MiniNatura, you play as bug-sized sprite searching for magic seeds in a forest full of moss and mushrooms. Explore all the nooks and crannies of the forest floor, and maybe you'll discover all of it's secrets.

Rotate the camera freely around the diorama to look for potential spots where a seed could be hidden, and dig up the sprout to collect them.

name: Star Wars: Eclipse
description: A new action-adventure, multiple-character branching narrative game set in the High Republic era, presented to you by Quantic Dream and Lucasfilm Games. Now early in development.

name: Wonder Woman
description:
This single-player open-world action game will introduce an original story set in the DC Universe and allow players to become Diana of Themyscira in the fight to unite her Amazon family and the humans from the modern world.

On Feburary 25th 2025, Warner Bros. announced it had canceled its planned Wonder Woman game along with shutting down three studios: Monolith Productions, Player First Games, and WB San Diego.

name: Alan Wake II
description: Alan Wake II is a 2023 psychological horror action-adventure game developed by Remedy Entertainment and published by Epic Games Publishing. The game follows writer Alan Wake as he navigates a nightmarish world where the boundaries between reality and fiction blur. Haunted by dark forces and his troubled past, he must uncover hidden truths while confronting supernatural enemies in a grim, atmospheric environment.

name: When the River Runs Dry
description: When The River Runs Dry is a game that joins together the adventure, narrative, and survival genres. With 2D art set in a 3D environment, there is a whole world to explore with many different landscapes and tons of different characters to meet!

name: Slitterhead
description:
Set in the densely cluttered streets of "Kowlong," filled with obscurity and chaos, this battle action-adventure game casts players as the "Hyoki," an entity devoid of memory and physical form. His only motive is to eradicate the monstrous beings known as "Slitterheads" crawling around the city, disguising themselves as humans.

Roaming the vibrant neon-lit cityscape, players must seek out allies among humans known as "Rarities," infiltrate and track dangerous organizations, and engage in battles harnessing the power of blood. As the suspenseful drama unfolds, delve into the mystery behind Hyoki's existence and the appearance of the Slitterheads.

name: Nightingale
description: Nightingale is a shared world survival-crafting game set in a rich gaslamp Victorian fantasy setting. Players venture through portals where adventure and mystery awaits across a myriad of beautiful and increasingly-dangerous worlds.

name: Contractually Bound
description: You are trapped inside an office and you don't know how you got there. All you see is a contract in front of you and when you break it, it effects the world around you. You explore the seemingly abandoned office in hopes of finding your escape.

name: The Matrix: Awakens - An Unreal Engine 5 Experience
description: The Matrix: Awakens morphs from breathtakingly realistic cinematic to fast-paced third-person shooter experience, complete with action-packed car chase sequence, and also provides a rich, vastly detailed open world to explore, set within the universe of 'The Matrix'.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II
description: The galaxy is in peril. Entire worlds are falling. The Imperium needs you. Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine, the greatest of the Emperor's warriors, with Clive Standen (Vikings, Taken) as the iconic Captain Titus. Unleash deadly abilities and an arsenal of devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid hordes. Hold at bay the horrors of the galaxy in epic battles on far-flung planets. Uncover dark secrets and drive back the everlasting night to prove your ultimate loyalty to humanity.

name: Dune: Spice Wars
description: Dune: Spice Wars is a real-time strategy game with 4X elements, from the developers of the critically acclaimed Northgard. Set in Frank Herbert’s groundbreaking Dune universe, you must lead your faction and battle for control and dominance over the harsh desert planet of Arrakis. Best your opponents through political intrigue, crush them in combat, and undermine them with your network of illusive spies.

name: Among Us VR
description: Teamwork and betrayal in space! In this VR party game, Crewmates work together to complete tasks before one or more Impostors kill everyone aboard. Experience all of the same deception and deceit as the original game, but now in your own virtual Skeld.

name: Star Trek: Resurgence
description: Star Trek: Resurgence is an interactive narrative video game that tells an original story in a choice-driven adventure set within the iconic sci-fi universe

name: Rumbleverse
description:
Rumbleverse is a brand new, free-to-play, 40-person Brawler Royale where anyone can be a champion.

In February 2023, Epic games announced that it was shutting down all support and servers for Rumbleverse. This took effect as of 28th February 2023.

name: ARC Raiders
description: ARC Raiders is a free-to-play, reimagined, cooperative action shooter that offers an intense struggle in every session: together with your squad, defend our home and resist the onslaught of ARC – a ruthless mechanized threat descending from space.

name: Coffee Break Mazes
description: Do you remember when our computers came preloaded with those very simple games, minesweeper, solitaire... That was nice, and I miss small, pleasant little digital diversions to click on absentmindedly during a break.

name: Romance Club
description:
An interactive visual novel game for mobile devices. Play your way through dozens of titles spanning several genres, including mystery, sci-fi, romance, and fantasy. Customize your character, choose your route, pursue your love interests, unlock full color images. But be careful -- the choices you make will affect your journey and your story's outcome!

Available on Apple Store and Google Play.

name: Deadly Dog-Dating Dungeon
description: Slay foes, solve puzzles, and flirt to dispel a really weird curse

name: Disk Mayhem
description: Slice your friends in half in this fun 2D platformer fighter!

name: Canine Cravings
description: Cooperate (or sabotage) each other with these 2 adorable tug-of-war puppies!

name: Roombattle
description:
Roombattle is a party fighting game where players will control robotic vacuum cleaners and will fight equipped with sharp objects and balloons. The main objective is to be the last to be equipped balloons in the game. In addition to the battles, the game contains a large crowd of minigames.

Meet up with your friends, customize your vacuum, and get ready to battle in different rooms to claim victory!

name: SpaceHook
description: A fun hooking game for 2-4 players!

name: Cryomancer
description: Go through a series of challenges with your ice-making powers!

name: The Ribbon Club ch1: Tea and Cake
description: Help a forgetful mouse prepare a tea party!

name: Fungy
description: Gather an unlikely team to stop GovCorp and save your dying plant friends!

name: Buffet Blast
description: Eat to Explode!

name: Forge Party
description: A party game about creating weapons under pressure

name: Free Jazz Party Animals
description: Free Jazz Party Experience

name: Alienxplode
description: Who is who? Find fast, kill fast and hide faster. Party-game up to 4 players.

name: Clean Adventure
description: Clean Adventure is an educational adventure game. Use your soap gun to defend yourself from germs. Be careful - there are many germs at the streets! Keep yourself safe with the collectable items.

name: The End of Warren's House
description: Sin descripción

name: Magnet
description: Sin descripción

name: Flannel Amethyst
description: Join Franka in Flannel Amethyst: a 3D platformer featuring ten different levels. Double jump and airdash your way through various levels and use your burst to reach greater heights!

name: Fishing Simulator 2D
description: An RNG based fishing game

name: The Bear's Black Heart
description: A roguelike lite made for Wizard Jam 4

name: Glory Hunters
description: Glory Hunters is an innovative action-adventure RPG designed for the original GameBoy. It introduces a distinctive and original gameplay twist: progression is driven by earning achievements.

name: The Ribbon Club ch2: Spring Storm
description: Run some errands on a rainy day!

name: Santa's Workshop
description: Help Santa grow trees and create toys for Christmas and become the biggest toy factory in the world.

name: The Intruder
description: The Intruder is an attempt at joining together survival horror gameplay and decision making with visual Novel storytelling and presentation.

name: Jump Challenge!
description:
Jump Challenge! is an arcade game in which you must run away from the lava! To escape, you must face numerous obstacles such as spikes, shooting flowers, cacti, cannons, and much more! You can also race with your buddies or run away from lava together!

It's a platformer set in mines, castles, jungles, the sky and space! Your goal is to jump from one "level" to the next as high as you can.
And beat all the other players in this universe by getting the highest score! Good luck!

name: Galzoo Island
description: Leo is called a genius in using basic magic spells. But he is still learning the spells for monster capturing and he can't even tame weak monsters yet.One day he meets with a monster girl 'Captain Vanilla' and she teleports him to a mysterious island saying this will help him master his magic.

name: I Remember It All
description: A short and sweet story driven adventure.

name: The Propahverse Trilogy: Episode I
description: The first installment of a three part series of interactive surrealist comedy by Sean Oxspring

name: Trial of the Tower God
description: Ricochet your shield for both attack and defense in this top-down dungeon crawler.

name: My Cabin
description: Paint your dream cabin landscape.
